MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10pm to repair an underground cable fault on Tollcross road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:44PM on Thursday 08 April 2021.
